languages.text: Через бронестекло было отчетливо видно, что Леди-Навигатор нервничала, раз за разом перечитывая некие рукописи. Ее волнение передалось слугам, у которых все валилось из рук.

traits.locale_text: Через бронестекло было отчетливо видно, что Леди-Навигатор нервничала, раз за разом перечитывая некие рукописи. Ее волнение передалось слугам, у которых все валилось из рук.

languages.text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.
languages.original_text: Через бронестекло было отчетливо видно, что Леди-Навигатор нервничала, раз за разом перечитывая некие рукописи. Ее волнение передалось слугам, у которых все валилось из рук.

traits.locale_text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, reading through some kind of manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

languages.text: 私たちは装甲ガラス越しに航宙士の姿をはっきりと視認した。緊張した面持ちで原稿を繰り返しパラパラめくっていた。彼女の不安は従者に伝染した。そのために、従者たちは適切な行動がとれなかっただけだ。
languages.original_text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

traits.locale_text: 私たちは装甲ガラス越しに航宙士の姿をはっきりと視認した。緊張した面持ちで原稿を繰り返しパラパラめくっていた。彼女の不安は従者に伝染した。そのために、従者たちは適切な行動がとれなかっただけだ。

languages.text: 透过塑钢玻璃，我们清清楚楚地看到了导航者女士。她很紧张，一遍又一遍地翻着手稿。她的焦虑感染了她的仆人，所以那些仆人什么事情都办不好。
languages.original_text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

traits.locale_text: 透过塑钢玻璃，我们清清楚楚地看到了导航者女士。她很紧张，一遍又一遍地翻着某种手稿。她的焦虑感染了她的仆人，所以那些仆人什么事情都办不好。

languages.text: Nous pouvions voir la dame navigatrice de l'autre côté de l'armaverre. Elle feuilletait fébrilement un manuscrit. Son anxiété a fini par gagner les serviteurs, qui n'arrivaient plus à faire quoi que ce soit correctement.
languages.original_text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

traits.locale_text: Nous pouvions voir la dame navigatrice de l'autre côté de l'armaverre. Elle feuilletait fébrilement un manuscrit. Son anxiété a fini par gagner les serviteurs, qui n'arrivaient plus à faire quoi que ce soit correctement.

languages.text: Vimos claramente a la lady Navegante a través del armavidrio. Estaba nerviosa y no paraba de hojear varios manuscritos. Su ansiedad se transmitía a los sirvientes, y por ese motivo no parecían capaces de hacer nada a derechas.
languages.original_text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

traits.locale_text: Vimos claramente a la lady Navegante a través del armavidrio. Estaba nerviosa y no paraba de hojear varios manuscritos. Su ansiedad se transmitía a los sirvientes, y por ese motivo no parecían capaces de hacer nada a derechas.

languages.text: Wir konnten die Lady Navigator durch das Armaglas ganz deutlich sehen. Sie war nervös, blätterte wie wild durch Manuskripte. Ihre Nervosität übertrug sich auf die Diener, die deswegen nichts richtig machen konnten.
languages.original_text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

traits.locale_text: Wir konnten die Lady Navigator durch das Armaglas ganz deutlich sehen. Sie war nervös, blätterte wie wild durch ein Manuskript. Ihre Nervosität übertrug sich auf die Diener, die deswegen nichts richtig machen konnten.

languages.text: Zırhcamdan Leydi Rotacı'yı net bir şekilde görebiliyorduk. Gergindi, birtakım el yazmalarını karıştırıp duruyordu. Leydi Rotacı'nın kaygıları hizmetkârlara da yansıdığı için hiçbir işi doğru düzgün yapamıyorlardı.
languages.original_text: We could see the Lady Navigator clearly through the armaglass. She was nervous, flicking through some manuscripts over and over. Her anxiety was passed on to the servants, and because of it, they just couldn't do anything right.

traits.locale_text: Zırhcamdan Leydi Rotacı'yı net bir şekilde görebiliyorduk. Gergindi, sürekli bazı el yazmalarını karıştırıyordu. Leydi Rotacı'nın kaygıları hizmetkârlara da yansıdığı için hiçbir işi doğru düzgün yapamıyorlardı.
